main event: Several observers in Chiengmai reported sighting a low-flying object moving at high speed on February 9, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, phosphorescent, oval-shaped entity approximately the size of a basketball,Some eyewitnesses reported seeing puffs of green vapor or smoke emanating from the object,Several witnesses, including a French Priest and local officials, provided varying accounts of the object's movement and appearance,Some observers claimed to hear a rushing noise as the object passed, while most reported no sound,The sighting led to an extensive search involving local authorities and journalists, though no evidence of the object was found.
witness description: eyewitnesses including officials and a French Catholic Priest
